DESCRIPTION:
Get Email or SMS OTP. For OTP, you need to provide either `email` or `phone` if you are not logged in.
    `operation` can be one of: 
- LOGIN
- FORGOT_PASSWORD
- CREATE_ROLE
- UPDATE_ROLE
- DELETE_ROLE
NAME: Empty Operation - Get Email or SMS OTP
Fetch user by ID - successful
SUB SUITE: v1 > Users > Fetch user by ID

NAME: Add user to an organization - no auth
SUB SUITE: v1 > Organizations > Users > Add users to an organization

NAME: Empty last name - Send user invitation token
category by id
SUB SUITE: v1 > Notifications > Category > Fetch category by d

NAME: Delete Attachment from Issue
SUB SUITE: v1 > Customer 360 > Issues > delete attachment to an issue

NAME: Get all Issues
SUB SUITE: v1 > Customer 360 > Issues > get all issues

NAME: Get events - end date earlier than start date
No Auth - Get all definitions
SUB SUITE: v1 > Static Definitions > Retrieve definition by ID

NAME: Remove user from an organization - successful
SUB SUITE: v1 > Organizations > Users > Remove users from an organization

SUB SUITE: v1 > Users > Fetch user by ID

SUB SUITE: v1 > Organizations > Managers > Fetch managers of an organization
